text: [Gentle music and sounds of the stream]
[Birds chirping]

[Female voice]
♫ Row, row, row your boat ♫
♫ Gently down the stream ♫
♫ Merrily, merrily, merrily, merrily. Life is but a dream. ♫

[Male voice]
♫ Row, row, row your boat ♫
♫ Gently down the stream ♫
♫ Merrily, merrily, merrily, merrily. Life is but a dream. ♫

[Female voice]
♫ Row, row, row your boat ♫
♫ Gently down the stream ♫
♫ Merrily, merrily, merrily, merrily. Life is but a dream. ♫

[Male and female voices]
♫ Row, row, row your boat ♫
♫ Gently down the stream ♫
♫ Merrily, merrily, merrily, merrily. Life is but a dream. ♫
[Singing in the round]

[Female voice]
♫ Row, row, row your boat ♫

[Male voice]
♫ Row, row, row your boat ♫

[Female voice]
♫ Row, row, row your boat ♫

[Male voice]
♫ Row, row, row your boat ♫
♫ Gently down the stream ♫
♫ Merrily, merrily, merrily, merrily. Life is but a dream. ♫

[Male and female singing together]
♫ Life is but a dream. ♫
[Sounds of the stream and birds chirping]
